tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE motion_sensor_activations (
  id INT,
  activation_time TIMESTAMP,
  sensor_id INT,
  location VARCHAR,
  intruder_detected BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE motion_sensor_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID NOT NULL,
  activation_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR NOT NULL,
  is_intruder_detected BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);
